pages.text: Wa Lamma Raja`a Musa 'Ila Qawmihi Ghađbana 'Asifaan Qala Bi'sama Khalaftumuni Min Ba`di 'A`ajiltum 'Amra Rabbikum Wa 'Alqa Al-'Alwaha Wa 'Akhadha Bira'si 'Akhihi Yajurruhu 'Ilayhi Qala Abna 'Umma 'Inna Al-Qawma Astađ`afuni Wa Kadu Yaqtulunani Fala Tushmit Biya Al-'A`da'a Wa La Taj`alni Ma`a Al-Qawmi Az-Zalimina
Qala Rabbi Aghfir Li Wa Li'akhi Wa 'Adkhilna Fi Rahmatika Wa 'Anta 'Arhamu Ar-Rahimina
Inna Al-Ladhina Attakhadhu Al-`Ijla Sayanaluhum Ghađabun Min Rabbihim Wa Dhillatun Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Kadhalika Najzi Al-Muftarina
Wa Al-Ladhina `Amilu As-Sayyi'ati Thumma Tabu Min Ba`diha Wa 'Amanu 'Inna Rabbaka Min Ba`diha Laghafurun Rahimun
Wa Lamma Sakata `An Musa Al-Ghađabu 'Akhadha Al-'Alwaha Wa Fi Nuskhatiha Hudaan Wa Rahmatun Lilladhina Hum Lirabbihim Yarhabuna

Wa Akhtara Musa Qawmahu Sab`ina Rajulaan Limiqatina Falamma 'Akhadhat/humu Ar-Rajfatu Qala Rabbi Law Shi'ta 'Ahlaktahum Min Qablu Wa 'Iyaya 'Atuhlikuna Bima Fa`ala As-Sufaha'u Minna 'In Hiya 'Illa Fitnatuka Tuđillu Biha Man Tasha'u Wa Tahdi Man Tasha'u 'Anta Waliyuna Faghfir Lana Wa Arhamna Wa 'Anta Khayru Al-Ghafirina
